channel.title: TestScape help
channel.description:
[s]1.i read and did tut on how to make owners c crowns but it doesnt work.[/s]
2.need tut on how to mk no runes needed for spells
3. how to change hit speed on npcs
those are it plz reply with answers

item.title: TestScape help
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

if(playerLevel[6] >= 1)

[6] = magic lvl
=1 = that it needs lvl 1 to cast
addSkillXP((15playerLevel[6]), 6); 15 = amount of xp u get given from casting

If u want to change this u need to change it on the codes for wind strike or other spells

Read full topic

item.title: TestScape help
item.dc:creator: @soalreaver soalreaver
item.description:
@soalreaver wrote:

ok gime a min ill go find something on it[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 18:22:42[/size][hr]ok… so if this is out spell
if(magicID == 1152) // Wind strike
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 1)
{
if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==false))
{
sendMessage(“You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==true))
{
//offsetY = (absY - EnemyY2) * -1;
//offsetX = (absX - EnemyX2) * -1;
//GraphicsHandler.addSpell(90, absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 160, 91, 43, 31, 92, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(6);
inCombat();
stillgfx(92, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
//PkingDelay = 15;
setAnimation(711);
addSkillXP((15*playerLevel[6]), 6);
//sendMessage(“You Cast A Weak Wind Spell”);
deleteItem(558, getItemSlot(558), 1);
deleteItem(556, getItemSlot(556), 1);
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
//castOnPlayer.currentHealth -= castOnPlayer.hitDiff;
}
}

the runes needed are in bold, im not shure what will happen if u delete them but it may work it may not
the italic is the ammount …or mabey the underlined u could just change that to false.
still not shure bout this lol, dont see y it wont work though, just make shure u backup your client first

Read full topic

item.title: TestScape help
item.dc:creator: @jazzy3001 jazzy3001
item.description:
@jazzy3001 wrote:

I know how to make yourself admin search for this

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

then under that you should see this

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

where it says admin just put your name and it should work

Read full topic
